name: Dynamic Bar Graphs using Auto Layout
description:
I have always struggled in Figma with having graphs within components. I was not able to make the adjustments to each graph when needed without needing a new component or breaking away. Due to this issue, I went out on a mission to figure out how to do better graphs in Figma which lead me to use Auto layout as of 9 months ago. This method now gives me control whenever I need it.


What?

  • A systematic approach to data in Figma
  • Reusable single graph component
  • Dynamic visuals that leverage Auto layout


Why?

  • Math rather than guesswork when sizing bars
  • Easy to use within other components
  • Rapid iterations across all instances
  • Smooth transitions between data sets
